message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $10,000.  Let me know if you're willing to work with me on that price.
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is a fair starting point considering the value this product offers.  To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is my final offer.
